sources.title: The Fiery Miles
sources.description:
Civil war, southern steppes of Russia. Circumstances bring together different people: security officer Zavragin, professor Shelako, famous artist Orlinsky, nurse Katya and White Guard officer Beklemishev. They make their way through the white cordons into the city occupied by the Red Army. Beklemishev needs to get into the city in order to, with the help of a group of conspirators, raise a rebellion against Soviet power...

Year of production: 1957

Director: Samsonov Samson
Screenwriter: Nikolay Figurovsky
Composer: Nikolay Kryukov
Operator: Dobronravov Fedor
Production designer: Markin Nikolay

Cast: Margarita Volodina, Vladimir Kenigson, Mikhail Pogorzhelsky, Mikhail Troyanovsky, Evgeniy Burenkov, Anthony Khodursky, Victor Stepanov, Anatoly Osmolsky, Nikita Kondratyev, Nikolay Markin, Sergey Pryanishnikov, Ivan Savkin
